text: Hamono pes az in ham (ja'ne, dar cangi Taʙuk) fitnagari mekardand va ʙaroi tu ej Pajomʙar, korhoro ʙar'aks va digargun cilva medodand (ja'ne, kusis mekardand, ki ʙa har roh az pesrafti dini tu pesgiri kunand), to on goh ki haq ƣoliʙ omad va farmoni Alloh oskor sud, dar hole, ki onhoro xus nameomad, ki din piruz savad
